headline: Resolution of the Burrows-Wheeler Transform Conjecture
description: <p>In this paper, we show that <em>r</em> = <img alt="cacm6506_bs.gif" src="https://dl.acm.org/cms/attachment/5a6b4346-4395-4bd9-8412-e526c7182d7d/cacm6506_bs.gif" />(<em>z</em> log<sup>2</sup> <em>n</em>) holds for every text. This result has numerous implications for text indexing and data compression.</p>
headline_zh-Hans: 伯罗斯-维勒变换猜想的解决
headline_zh-Hant: 伯羅斯-維勒變換猜想的解決
description_zh-Hans: <p>在本文中，我们表明<em>r</em>=<img alt="cacm6506_bs.gif" src="https://dl.acm.org/cms/attachment/5a6b4346-4395-4bd9-8412-e526c7182d7d/cacm6506_bs.gif" />(<em>z</em> log<sup> 2< /sup> < em> n< /em> ) 对每个文本都成立。这一结果对文本索引和数据压缩有许多影响。</p>
description_zh-Hant: <p>在本文中，我們表明<em>r</em>=<img alt="cacm6506_bs.gif" src="https://dl.acm.org/cms/attachment/5a6b4346-4395-4bd9-8412-e526c7182d7d/cacm6506_bs.gif" />(<em>z</em> log<sup> 2< /sup> < em> n< /em> ) 對每個文本都成立。這一結果對文本索引和數據壓縮有許多影響。</p>
